title: A direction to finde all those names expressed in that large table of genealogies of Scripture lately gathered by I.S. whereof the first number serueth for the side margentes, and the later answerable to the highest fygures.
author: Broughton, Hugh, 1549-1612.
notes: Attributed to Broughton by STC (2nd ed.); also attributed to John Speed--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place and date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproductions of original in the Cambridge University Library.
